name: internal_guideline_compliance_checker
description: Analyzes Python code for internal guideline violations and generates a compliance report.

cli_options.--json: Outputs the violations report in JSON format to the reports folder
cli_options.--summary: Prints a summary of checked functions and violations count

functions.name: check_compliance
functions.description: Returns a report on whether the file meets internal coding guidelines.

arguments.file_path: Path to the Python file to analyze
